original_text: Lifting up his eyes, then, and seeing that a large crowd was coming toward him, Jesus said to Philip, “Where are we to buy bread, so that these people may eat?”
korean_text: 예수께서 눈을 들어 큰 무리가 자기에게로 오는 것을 보시고 빌립에게 이르시되 우리가 어디서 떡을 사서 이 사람들을 먹이겠느냐 하시니

sentences.original_text: and seeing that a large crowd was coming toward him,
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 무리가 자기에게 오는 것을 보시고,
우리가 떡을 살 곳이 어디에 있겠느냐,

sentences.original_text: so that these people may eat?”
